prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating tetrahedral, fractal, merkaba patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast and neutral grey ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with celestial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor NOTIABI's profile: 'Servant who speaks the truth', Aethyr OXO, Air element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'When NOTIABI is invoked, truth arrives like a lightning strike sharp, sudden, and unerring, cutting ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

profile_data.title: 'Servant who speaks the truth'
profile_data.essence: When NOTIABI is invoked, truth arrives like a lightning strike sharp, sudden, and unerring, cutting through falsehood in an instant.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Lightning Revelation; marshals celestial legions.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-dimensional geometric construct combining lightning-like fractal structures with translucent prism-like edges, representing the lightning revelation of truth through Air element's intellectual clarity
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents Air's mental clarity and lightning's revelatory power; silver-white symbolizes divine truth and celestial transmission from Enochian angelic traditions
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Merkaba geometry represents divine light vehicle; tetrahedron symbolizes pure mental construct; fractal patterns demonstrate infinite complexity of truth
